description: Single storey side/rear infill extension (ground floor); rear roof extension (involving conversion of roofspace to habitable use).
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Proposed - site plan 14-2016/40SMR/100, Proposed street elevation 14-2016/40SMR/304 June 2016, Proposed - ground floor plan 14-2016/40SMR/300 June 2016, Proposed - first floor plan 14-2016/40SMR/301 June 2016, Proposed - second floor plan 14-2016/40SMR/302 Rev. A June 2016, Proposed - roof plan 14-2016/40SMR/303 Rev. A June 2016, Proposed - rear elevation section aa 14-2016/40SMR/304 Rev. A June 2016, Proposed - side elevation/section 14-2016/40SMR/306 Rev. A  June 2016,
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing building and be in accordance with the details indicated on the approved plans.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2015) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (2015), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012
